text:
Underused hack for (much) better ChatGPT chats:

Step 1 - Turn on "Deep Research".
Step 2 - Copy & paste this prompt:

Prompt: "I want to [desired results] with [constraints]. [What/How/Why] has been [desired results]?"

Step 3: Answer ChatGPT's questions (3-5 of them).
Step 4: Once you receive the report, you follow up.

-- WHY STARTING WITH DEEP RESEARCH --

Your prompt lacks context:
1. It lacks data on what has been done.
2. It lacks precision of what you want to achieve.
3. It lacks direction on where you should go.

Starting with Deep Research fixes all of it.

-- HOW TO PROMPT CHATGPT BETTER --

Here are my favorite ressources:

1. How to AI - how-to-ai.guide
Perfect for non-technical people to master AI.

2. OpenAI Academy - academy.openai.com
The official academy of ChatGPT & OpenAI.

3. Gemini prompting - https://lnkd.in/gbmYrKJB
The best prompt guide from Google.
